comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydroFrancis adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydroFrancis/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Detailed hydro unit - Francis model.  This model can be used to represent three types of governors. A schematic of the hydraulic system of detailed hydro unit models, like Francis and Pelton, is provided in the DetailedHydroModelHydraulicSystem diagram.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: am
contents.comment: Opening section S at the maximum efficiency (Am).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: av0
contents.comment: Area of the surge tank (A). Unit = m. Typical Value = 30. Default: 0.0

contents.name: av1
contents.comment: Area of the compensation tank (A). Unit = m. Typical Value = 700. Default: 0.0

contents.name: bp
contents.comment: Droop (Bp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db1
contents.comment: Intentional dead-band width (DB1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: etamax
contents.comment: Maximum efficiency (EtaMax).  Typical Value = 1.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: governorControl
contents.comment: Governor control flag (Cflag).  Typical Value = mechanicHydrolicTachoAccelerator. Default: None

contents.name: h1
contents.comment: Head of compensation chamber water level with respect to the level of penstock (H).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: h2
contents.comment: Head of surge tank water level with respect to the level of penstock (H).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 40. Default: 0.0

contents.name: hn
contents.comment: Rated hydraulic head (H).  Unit = m. Typical Value = 250. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Penstock loss coefficient (due to friction) (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.025. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Water tunnel and surge chamber loss coefficient (due to friction) (Kg).  Typical Value = 0.025. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kt
contents.comment: Washout gain (Kt).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: qc0
contents.comment: No-load turbine flow at nominal head (Qc0).  Typical Value = 0.21. Default: 0.0

contents.name: qn
contents.comment: Rated flow (Q). Unit = m/s. Typical Value = 40. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Derivative gain (Ta).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: td
contents.comment: Washout time constant (Td).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: ts
contents.comment: Gate servo time constant (Ts).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: twnc
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Twnc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: twng
contents.comment: Water tunnel and surge chamber inertia time constant (Twng). Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: tx
contents.comment: Derivative feedback gain (Tx).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: va
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening velocity (Va).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.011. Default: 0.0

contents.name: valvmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening (ValvMax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: valvmin
contents.comment: Minimum gate opening (ValvMin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vc
contents.comment: Maximum gate closing velocity (Vc).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -0.011. Default: 0.0

contents.name: waterTunnelSurgeChamberSimulation
contents.comment: Water tunnel and surge chamber simulation (Tflag). true = enable of water tunnel and surge chamber simulation false = inhibit of water tunnel and surge chamber simulation. Typical Value = false. Default: False

contents.name: zsfc
contents.comment: Head of upper water level with respect to the level of penstock (Zsfc).  Unit = m.  Typical Value = 25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
